page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT OF RESIDENTS
page.content: WE DID A SURVEY TO FIND OUT WHAT WORK OUR PARENTS DID AMD WHERE THEY WORKED.HALF THE MOTHERS DID NOT DO PAID WORK OUTSIDE THE HOME.THE MAJORITY OF THOSE THAT DID WORKED IN {OFFICES AND SHOPS}WITHIN FIVE MILES OF HOME. THE FATHERS WORKED IN A MUCH LARGER RANGE OF JOBS AND THE MAJORITY WORKED WITHIN A TWENTY MILE RADIUS OF HOME,MANY IN LONDON.THE LARGEST GROUP WERE{WHITE COLLAR WORKERS,}EITHER PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE OR MANAGEMENT.THIS ACCOUNTED FOR NEARLY ONE QUARTER OF THE SAMPLE.THE NEXT LARGEST GROUP WERE {ENGINEERS}OF VARIOUS KINDS AND THEN {PRINT}WORKERS.AMONGST THE LESS COMMON JOBS WERE A{LONDON TAXI DRIVER}AND A {BROADCASTER.}
